title: Crater Lake National Park: Secchi Disc
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Research Equipment     Secchi Disc                Secchi Disk      The first "secchi disk" type measurement was done in 1896 and recorded a depth of 30 meters.  A few sporadic readings occurred in 1913, 1937-39, 1954, 1960, 1968-69, but regular annual measurements began in 1978 and continue to the present.              Secchi Disk part 1   Loading the player...
